meanings.definition: Not able to be forgotten or erased from memory.
meanings.sent1: The unforgettable song played on the radio all day.
meanings.sent2: The movie had an unforgettable ending that stayed with me.
meanings.sent3: The unforgettable joke made everyone laugh for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an unforgettable ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the cake was so unforgettable, I can still remember it.

meanings.definition: Making a strong or lasting impression.
meanings.sent1: The unforgettable performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The painting had an unforgettable beauty that captivated all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The unforgettable party was talked about for weeks.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an unforgettable melody that lingered in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was truly unforgettable, etched in my memory forever.
